title: I have miopia and I cannot read champion levels after "improvement"
body:
Numbers are too thin and it is impossible to distinguish 6/8/9 for example.
I didn't have such issue before.

replies.body: you rioters sure are drawn to unusual words :D

Hi,

1920x1080

I think it was fixed in 8.1. I can see levels normally again.
Thanks.

I have the same problem in 1920x1080

I can read them when people stand still, but as soon as the healthbar is moving the numbers seem super blurry or out of focus to me and trying to read them gives me a headache
Have your eyes checked out at a doctor and get glasses. Playing computer games with uncorrected myopia is rather bad for your eyes.

1. It's not the point.
2. You know that in some cases glasses is not a solution and can enhance miopia?!
